body:
**What happened**:
* Set up a HA cluster with 1.9 and 1.10 API servers (occurs on any apiserver skew boundary where a cohabitating resource's storage version changed groups)
* Observed errors when modifying workload objects:
  * when modified via the 1.10 server, saw this error in the 1.9 server: `failed to prepare current and previous objects: v1.Deployment is not suitable for converting to {{"extensions" "__internal"} [{"extensions" ""} {"extensions" ""}]}`
  * when modified via the 1.9 server, saw this error in the 1.10 server: `failed to prepare current and previous objects: v1beta1.Deployment is not suitable for converting to {{"apps" "__internal"} [{"apps" ""} {"apps" ""}]}`
* When this error was encountered, all watchers for the resource in question would be dropped and have to re-establish, and the internal watchers feeding the watch cache would drop and re-establish

**What you expected to happen**:
* Watch events from all supported storage versions are processed correctly

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:
* Start a server from master (for inspectability, store in json). With https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/73477:
    ```
    export STORAGE_MEDIA_TYPE=application/json
    export KUBE_PANIC_WATCH_DECODE_ERROR=false
    hack/local-up-cluster.sh
    ```
* Create a deployment (e.g. kube-dns in kube-system)
* Establish a watch via extensions (kubectl get deployments.extensions --all-namespaces -w)
* Establish a watch via apps (kubectl get deployments.apps --all-namespaces -w)
* Tail the kube-apiserver log
* Change the apps/v1 deployment in etcd to extensions/v1beta1:
    ```
    ETCDCTL_API=3 etcdctl get /registry/deployments/kube-system/kube-dns --print-value-only \
    | \
    kubectl convert -f - --output-version=extensions/v1beta1 -o json \
    | \
    jq '.items[0] | .metadata.namespace = "kube-system"' \
    | \
    ETCDCTL_API=3 etcdctl put /registry/deployments/kube-system/kube-dns
    ```
* Observer client watches drop and server log errors:
```
E0129 10:42:55.911298   76283 watcher.go:268] failed to prepare current and previous objects: v1beta1.Deployment is not suitable for converting to {{"apps" "__internal"} [{"apps" ""} {"apps" ""}]} in scheme "k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/legacyscheme/scheme.go:29"
E0129 10:42:55.911298   76283 watcher.go:268] failed to prepare current and previous objects: v1beta1.Deployment is not suitable for converting to {{"apps" "__internal"} [{"apps" ""} {"apps" ""}]} in scheme "k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/legacyscheme/scheme.go:29"
E0129 10:42:55.911322   76283 watcher.go:268] failed to prepare current and previous objects: v1beta1.Deployment is not suitable for converting to {{"apps" "__internal"} [{"apps" ""} {"apps" ""}]} in scheme "k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/legacyscheme/scheme.go:29"
E0129 10:42:55.911494   76283 watcher.go:268] failed to prepare current and previous objects: v1beta1.Deployment is not suitable for converting to {{"apps" "__internal"} [{"apps" ""} {"apps" ""}]} in scheme "k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/legacyscheme/scheme.go:29"
W0129 10:42:55.914348   76283 reflector.go:303] storage/cacher.go:/deployments: watch of *apps.Deployment ended with: Internal error occurred: v1beta1.Deployment is not suitable for converting to {{"apps" "__internal"} [{"apps" ""} {"apps" ""}]} in scheme "k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/legacyscheme/scheme.go:29"
W0129 10:42:55.914402   76283 reflector.go:303] storage/cacher.go:/deployments: watch of *apps.Deployment ended with: Internal error occurred: v1beta1.Deployment is not suitable for converting to {{"apps" "__internal"} [{"apps" ""} {"apps" ""}]} in scheme "k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/legacyscheme/scheme.go:29"
W0129 10:42:55.914348   76283 reflector.go:303] storage/cacher.go:/deployments: watch of *apps.Deployment ended with: Internal error occurred: v1beta1.Deployment is not suitable for converting to {{"apps" "__internal"} [{"apps" ""} {"apps" ""}]} in scheme "k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/legacyscheme/scheme.go:29"
W0129 10:42:55.914478   76283 reflector.go:303] storage/cacher.go:/deployments: watch of *apps.Deployment ended with: Internal error occurred: v1beta1.Deployment is not suitable for converting to {{"apps" "__internal"} [{"apps" ""} {"apps" ""}]} in scheme "k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/legacyscheme/scheme.go:29"
I0129 10:42:56.916515   76283 reflector.go:170] Listing and watching *apps.Deployment from storage/cacher.go:/deployments
I0129 10:42:56.916515   76283 reflector.go:170] Listing and watching *apps.Deployment from storage/cacher.go:/deployments
```

**Anything else we need to know?**:

**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`):
- Cloud provider or hardware configuration:
- OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release):
- Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`):
- Install tools:
- Others:


/sig api-machinery
/cc @caesarxuchao @deads2k 
/priority critical-urgent

title: Cross-group watch events from etcd are not handled correctly
